name: NEAR Protocol
description: A scalable Layer-1 blockchain focused on developer-friendly tools and fast, low-cost transactions.

name: WURK.FUN

name: Pixel Games AI
description: Pixel Games AI uses PayAI to support instant in-game transactions and AI-driven gameplay services.

name: x402 Monopoly
description: x402 Monopoly showcases pay-per-action payments in a game environment using the x402 standard.

name: Predict
description: Predict integrates PayAI to enable real-time and usage-based payments for prediction and AI insights.

name: EarnFi
description: EarnFi is a Web3 rewards platform that helps users discover, track, and manage on-chain incentives.

name: Skale
description: Skale is a high-performance blockchain network built for scalable and gas-free decentralized applications.

name: tgmetrics
description: tgmetrics integrates PayAI to power on-demand analytics and insights for Telegram communities.

name: NOFA AI
description: Powered by PayAI, agents transact and settle strategies in real time. Advanced trading capabilities are now accessible to everyone.

name: t54 AI
description: t54 ai provides AI tools and services for data-driven applications.With PayAI, each AI request can be monetized individually.

name: DIRA Network

name: AiMo Network
